SaaS.title: Software as a Service
SaaS.description1: Having been at Metamaze from almost the start, we have built an Intelligent Document Processing SaaS from the ground up. We have experience with setting up, building and monitoring SaaS applications. Our prove we deliver? Metamaze got acquired by Duco in 2024.
SaaS.description2: After Metamaze we have built multiple SaaS-like applications @ Faktion.
SaaS.nurture: We know what it takes, it ain't easy. We know how to nurture a SaaS.

registry.title: Registries, inspired by shadcn
registry.description: We have been using shadcn for multiple years now over multiple projects. We have proven experience with setting up a registry and building a component library. The goal of a registry is to improve Developer Experience and design consistency. Move fast without breaking.

agentic.title: Generative AI & Agentic systems
agentic.description1: At Faktion we have built more than 10 agentic / generative AI systems. Building agents, building workflows, building chatbots, building tools, building systems, building everything.
agentic.call-to-action: Visit Faktion to see some of our work (yes we're proud)

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.description: We think beyond the code. We try to get the whole picture in order to create a sustainable product. Sometimes it requires process changes, sometimes technical changes. We are not afraid to take ownership of the product and the process.

iso-locale.title: @reacture-io/iso-locale
iso-locale.description: A comprehensive TypeScript library providing ISO standards for handling countries, languages, dialects, and currencies. This package offers full type safety using Zod validation with support for ISO 3166 country codes, ISO 639 language codes, BCP-47 dialects, and ISO 4217 currency codes.
